fn.p: Anders S. Christensen conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Thomas Hamelryck contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, wrote the paper, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Jan H. Jensen conceived and designed the experiments, analyzed the data, wrote the paper, reviewed drafts of the paper.
